Classes/EkoObject.html#/c:objc(cs)EkoObj.name: -observeWithBlock:
Classes/EkoObject.html#/c:objc(cs)EkoObj.abstract: Adds a block to observe changes in the proxy. Observers can be notified when the object is available. In case the object doesn’t exist or was unavailable an error will be passed.

Classes/EkoMessageRepository.html#/c:obj.name: context
Classes/EkoMessageRepository.html#/c:obj.abstract: The context used to create the instance

Classes/EkoMessageEditor.html#/c:objc(cs.name: context
Classes/EkoMessageEditor.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: The context used to create the instance

Classes/EkoMessageEditor.html#/c:objc(cs.name: messageID
Classes/EkoMessageEditor.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: The message ID associated with the instance

Classes/EkoCollection.html#/c:objc(cs)Ek.name: -objectAtIndex:
Classes/EkoCollection.html#/c:objc(cs)Ek.abstract: Returns an instance at a given index

Classes/EkoCollection.html#/c:objc(cs)Ek.name: -loadMore:
Classes/EkoCollection.html#/c:objc(cs)Ek.abstract: Requests more objects to load if any are available

Classes/EkoCollection.html#/c:objc(cs)Ek.name: -observeWithBlock:
Classes/EkoCollection.html#/c:objc(cs)Ek.abstract: Adds a block to observe changes in the collection

Classes/EkoChatContext.html#/c:objc(cs)E.name: +setUpWithAppId:
Classes/EkoChatContext.html#/c:objc(cs)E.abstract: Creates an instance of EkoChatContext with provided AppId.

Classes/EkoChatContext.html#/c:objc(cs)E.name: -registerDeviceWithUserId:displayName:
Classes/EkoChatContext.html#/c:objc(cs)E.abstract: Registers the the user with the current device. If the passed userId does not match the current user the current user will be unregistered

Classes/EkoChatContext.html#/c:objc(cs)E.name: -unregisterDevice
Classes/EkoChatContext.html#/c:objc(cs)E.abstract: Unregisters the current user associated with the device. The device will be unregisted for push notifications and data associated with the user will be removed from the device

Classes/EkoChatContext.html#/c:objc(cs)E.name: -registerForPushWithToken:
Classes/EkoChatContext.html#/c:objc(cs)E.abstract: Registers the device for Apple push notifications

Classes/EkoChatContext.html#/c:objc(cs)E.name: -unregisterForPush
Classes/EkoChatContext.html#/c:objc(cs)E.abstract: Unregisters the current user for Apple push notifications.

Classes/EkoChatContext.html#/c:objc(cs)E.name: -setDisplayName:complete:
Classes/EkoChatContext.html#/c:objc(cs)E.abstract: Sets the display name for the current user

Classes/EkoChannelRepository.html#/c:obj.name: -allChannels
Classes/EkoChannelRepository.html#/c:obj.abstract: Creates a collection instance representing all channel available for the current user

Classes/EkoChannelMembership.html#/c:obj.name: context
Classes/EkoChannelMembership.html#/c:obj.abstract: The context used to create the instance

Classes/EkoChannelMembership.html#/c:obj.name: channelID
Classes/EkoChannelMembership.html#/c:obj.abstract: The channel ID associated with the instance

Classes/EkoChannelMembership.html#/c:obj.name: -leaveWithComplete:
Classes/EkoChannelMembership.html#/c:obj.abstract: Leaves the channel for the current user

Classes/EkoChannel.html#/c:objc(cs)EkoCh.name: unreadCount
Classes/EkoChannel.html#/c:objc(cs)EkoCh.abstract: Unread messages for the current user in the channel

Classes/EkoChannelMembership.html.name: EkoChannelMembership
Classes/EkoChannelMembership.html.abstract: A membership encapsulates methods for managing users in a channel

Classes/EkoChannelRepository.html.name: EkoChannelRepository
Classes/EkoChannelRepository.html.abstract: Repository provides access channel and collections of channels

Classes/EkoChatContext.html.name: EkoChatContext
Classes/EkoChatContext.html.abstract: The Context object serves as an SDK entry point. Should be instatiated with an Application key and be retained by the caller. A valid context instance should be used to create other SDK resources

Classes/EkoCollection.html.name: EkoCollection
Classes/EkoCollection.html.abstract: A collection is a container type returned from queries. Clients can request to load more and observe insertions and changes to the objects in the collection. Initially the count will be zero. Observers will be notified of changes.

Classes/EkoMessageEditor.html.name: EkoMessageEditor
Classes/EkoMessageEditor.html.abstract: A editor encapsulates methods for managing messages

Type Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
